definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: field;—only pl.: abs. [[שְׁדֵמוֹת]] Hb Hab 3:17, Je 21:40 Qr (> Kt [[השׁרמוֹת]]); cstr. [[ת]]([[וֹ]])[[שַׁדְמ]] De 32:32 + 2 t.;—fields, as cultivated De 32:32, also (c. vb. sg.) Is 16:3, Hb Hab 3:17; as locality 2Ki 23:4, area Je 31:40.—[[שְׁדֵמָה]] Is 37:27 v. [[שְׁדֵפָה]].
